sentence.Network_en: With no lands of his own, he was no great matrimonial prize.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有自己的地产，不是结婚的上佳人选。

sentence.Network_en: It took ten cars to bear the matrimonial guests away.
sentence.Network_cn: 用了十辆汽车才把参加婚礼的客人们送走.

sentence.Network_en: Matrimonial vows are to show the faithfulness of the new couple.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚誓体现了新婚夫妇对婚姻的忠诚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin matrimonialis, from matrimonium (see matrimony)

entry.def: Matrimonial means concerning marriage or married people.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the state of marriage;
